channel.title: Gauntlet Comics: With Great Power: Master Edition in August
channel.description:
Every other Tuesday night in August ![](https://i.imgur.com/OWGdO2D.png?1) **Superheroes!** Impossibly fast. Inconceivably strong. Irresistibly inspiring.
**Supervillains!** Mind-bogglingly skilled. Breath-takingly ambitious. Heart-stoppingly cruel.
*With Great Power* is a cooperative and competitive story-making game. You and your friends will provoke, encourage, interrogate, tease, and applaud one another. The game will both drive you and challenge you to tell fantastic, amazing, strange, invincible, astonishing, incredible, mysterious, and downright uncanny stories about superheroes.
-----------------------------------
This game is part of the ongoing Gauntlet Comics series. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the Gauntlet Comics canon (and on our wiki) for future miniseries.
Being able to attend every session is not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
The X-Card safety tool will be on the table. For more information on the Gauntlet's safety tools, please refer to our Inclusivity Policy on the website (http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) This game session will be recorded for future publication.
[date=2019-08-13 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-08-13 time=24:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 01 of 02](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Li4sabCBaxE58NJykql) [date=2019-08-27 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-08-27 time=24:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 02 of 02](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Li4sdU54mLfZjgWHLuE)

item.title: Gauntlet Comics: With Great Power: Master Edition in August
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

Every other Tuesday night in August

1005×1000

Superheroes!
Impossibly fast.
Inconceivably strong.
Irresistibly inspiring.

Supervillains!
Mind-bogglingly skilled.
Breath-takingly ambitious.
Heart-stoppingly cruel.

With Great Power is a cooperative and competitive story-making game. You and your friends will provoke, encourage, interrogate, tease, and applaud one another. The game will both drive you and challenge you to tell fantastic, amazing, strange, invincible, astonishing, incredible, mysterious, and downright uncanny stories about superheroes.

This game is part of the ongoing Gauntlet Comics series. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the Gauntlet Comics canon (and on our wiki) for future miniseries.

Being able to attend every session is not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.

The X-Card safety tool will be on the table. For more information on the Gauntlet’s safety tools, please refer to our Inclusivity Policy on the website (http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) This game session will be recorded for future publication.
